Record.ClassificationPath: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Genital Diseases, Female/Adnexal Diseases
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Diseases of the uterine appendages (ADNEXA UTERI) including diseases involving the OVARY, the FALLOPIAN TUBES, and ligaments of the uterus (BROAD LIGAMENT; ROUND LIGAMENT).
